Transaction State Context.Deposit State: When users send Ether to the contract, and the Put function is called to lock their funds.
Transaction State Context.Withdrawal State: When users attempt to withdraw funds via the Collect function, conditioned on unlock times and balance requirements.

External Interactions.External Contract Interaction: Interacts with the LogFile contract to record transactions during deposit and withdrawal.
External Interactions.Ether Transfer: Transfers Ether from contract to users during withdrawals.
